channel.title: Pages on Burgers & Bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Burgers & Bytes

item.title: Microsoft Forms API
item.description: Every question type has is own setup of the body content. Body content The payload of the different question types all have the same parameters: questionInfo type title id order isQuiz required { "questionInfo": "", "type": "", "title": "Question", "id": "", "order": 4000500, "isQuiz": false, "required": false } Parameter type Question Type Choice Question.Choice Text Question.TextField Rating Question.Rating Date Question.DateTime Ranking Question.Ranking Likert Question.Matrix Upload File Question.FileUpload Net Promoter Score Question.

item.title: Spotlight
item.description: Below a list of my recent and upcoming events: 2025-12-03 - ESPC25 Dublin - Automated testing in the Power Platform: matching governance, upholding quality, compliance and efficiency (together with Arjan Rijsdijk) A session regarding how testing and governance go hand-in-hand and share practical tips for testing Power Apps Canvas and Power Automate. 2025-06-21 - CollabDays Netherlands - Unlocking Dataverse Functions: code less, do more! This session explores Dataverse Functions and triggers (formerly low-code plugins), a powerful tool for building logic in apps and workflows with minimal code.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Elianne and I am a Power Platform Consultant at Blis Digital in Barendrecht, The Netherlands. Since 2016 I obtained several Microsoft certifications: full transcript can be found on my Microsoft Learn profile. I love to gain more knowledge and expertise by going to different user groups and conferences myself, but I also like to share knowledge in different ways: by writing blogs, giving presentations, guest lectures at an university of applied science and app-in-a-day workshops.
